jScript

JavaScript based DOM manipulation tool. A recreation of jQuery.

How to Use jScript

Get codes on Github.

Install

Download jScript files from Github and add to document at head.

<script src="/path/to/jscript.min.js"></script>
Using jScript in local server?

If jScript is conflicting with any other code or you want ot change jScript constant just change $ at the last line.

}( '$' )); // Change the $ here

Setup

Now, you need to instantiate it by passing a DOM selector, HTML element, or list of HTML elements.

const selector = $(".body");

// or

const selector = $(document.body);

// or

const selector = $([document, document.head, document.body]);

Usage

DOM Modifiers

.add()

Create a new jQuery object with elements added to the set of matched elements.
